name: Lanbocms
body:
### Simple CMS for static pages
LanboCMS is simple module for Kohana 3.2. This cms based on one table in MySQL (+ auth module). If you create simple website with static content and custom fields use LanboCMS ;)
```

### Authors
@jwest

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with CMS? Please contact: jwest@jwest.pl
tagline: Simple cms with custom fields for static pages | Kohana 3.2 module
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
